original_title: くりいむレモン 亜美の日記
overview: On her 18th birthday, Ami Nonomura wants to meet her father and brother who live far away. While searching for her brother's house, she is attacked by a thief, but is helped by Hiroshi Tazaki. They fall in love but discover that they are siblings.
title: Cream Lemon: Ami's Diary
